message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $150. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $110?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. I can go down to $130.  I believe it's a fair price considering the value this product offers.
I'm still not sure about the price. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120?
